greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of AGM(1,1-8x) (where AGM denotes the arithmetic-geometric mean).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) ~ -Pi * 2^(3*n-1) / (n * log(n)^2) * (1 - (2*gamma + 4*log(2))/log(n) + (3*gamma^2 + 12*log(2)*gamma + 12*log(2)^2 - Pi^2/2) / log(n)^2), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 29 2019
results.author: _Roland Bacher_, Apr 20 2001
